metadata.name: Infinity Cycles #1
metadata.description:
Introducing the Infinity Cycles Collection, a unique set of NFTs that showcase mesmerizing looping spirograph animations based on polar coordinates! Inspired by the mathematical beauty of spirographs, this collection offers a stunning visual representation of the complex patterns that can be generated using simple geometric shapes.

Each NFT in the collection is a one-of-a-kind piece of art, created using custom algorithms and programming techniques to generate intricate spirograph designs that evolve over time. The animations are carefully crafted to create a seamless loop, allowing viewers to get lost in the hypnotic motion of the spirals and curves.
